snippet: No one was injured in the early morning accident in Tiskilwa, Ill., although six train cars, which were believed to be carrying ethanol, continued to burn.
lead_paragraph: No one was injured in the early morning accident in Tiskilwa, Ill., although six train cars, which were believed to be carrying ethanol, continued to burn.

headline.main: Most Leave Illinois Town After Fiery Train Derailment
headline.print_headline: Most Leave Illinois Town After Fiery Train Derailment
headline.seo: Train Derailment Causes Most in Illinois Town to Evacuate
